mapper.sql: dictionary.Id AS "id", dictionary.Name AS "name", dictionary.Alias AS "alias", dictionary.Description AS "description", dictionary.Source AS "source", dictionary.Type AS "type", dictionary.Instance AS "instance", dictionary.CreateTime AS "createTime", dictionary.LastUpdateTime AS "lastUpdateTime", dictionary.CreateUser AS "createUser", dictionary.LastUpdateUser AS "lastUpdateUser"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dictionary( Id, Name, Alias, Description, Source, Type, Instance, CreateTime, LastUpdateTime, CreateUser, LastUpdateUser ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO dictionary( Id, Name, Alias, Description, Source, Type, Instance, CreateTime, LastUpdateTime, CreateUser, LastUpdateUser ) VALUES
( #{dictionary.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dictionary.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictionary.alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictionary.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictionary.source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictionary.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictionary.instance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictionary.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dictionary.lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dictionary.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictionary.lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE dictionary
Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Instance = #{instance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LastUpdateTime = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LastUpdateUser = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
